explains: v. 侵蚀；磨损（erode 的 ing 形式）

sentences.en: Eroding religious belief in Europe may partly explain lowered birthrates.
sentences.cn: 欧洲宗教信仰的削弱可能是出生率下降的其中一个原因。

sentences.en: This slippery slope of eroding ethics and bigger risks leads only to disaster.
sentences.cn: 这种道德滑坡以及更大的风险只会导致灾难。

sentences.en: They operate by eroding your trust in your own intellect, gradually convincing you to put your trust into some external entity.
sentences.cn: 它们通过削弱您对自己智力的信任，逐渐说服你把信任放在某个外部实体上。
